refnamediv.refpurpose: Function to get state (high\low) of a digital input pin on AVR

listitem.para: port of microcontroller to be used
pin of port (mentioned above) to be used

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Each AVR microcontroller has pins which can be configured as digital inputs. These are normally divided among some 'ports' (group of pins). User has to select one of these port and which pin of that port as digital input.
This is curretly dummy function. It provides no functionality but is required for providing support for generating C code for AVR.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: pinA0 = AVRDigitalIn(1,0) //To read state on pin 0 of port A
